Me = weight in g of container filled up to the mark with water
Ms = weight in g of the sample
M = weight in g of the sample and container filled to the mark with water
Vs = (Me + Ms) - M
Md = Specific Gravity
Vd = Ms / Md
Vd = (Vs-Vd) / (Ms-Vd)*100

tr.t-if: data.specific_gravity_visible and (data.specific_gravity_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or data.specific_gravity_nabl == 'fail' and not nabl)
data.water_absorption_visible and (data.water_absorption_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or data.water_absorption_nabl == 'fail' and not nabl)
data.loose_bulk_visible and (data.loose_bulk_density_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or data.loose_bulk_density_nabl == 'fail' and not nabl)
data.rodded_bulk_visible and (data.rodded_bulk_density_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or data.rodded_bulk_density_nabl == 'fail' and not nabl)
data.moisture_content_visible and (data.moisture_content_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or data.moisture_content_nabl == 'fail' and not nabl)
data.soundness_mgso4_visible and (data.soundness_mgso4_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or data.soundness_mgso4_nabl == 'fail' and not nabl)
data.soundness_na2so4_visible and (data.soundness_na2so4_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or data.soundness_na2so4_nabl == 'fail' and not nabl)
data.clay_lump_visible and (data.clay_lumps_percent_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or data.clay_lumps_percent_nabl == 'fail' and not nabl)
data.light_weight_visible and (data.light_weight_percent_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or data.light_weight_percent_nabl == 'fail' and not nabl)
data.finer75_visible and (data.material_finer75_nabl == 'pass' and nabl or data.material_finer75_nabl == 'fail' and not nabl)

ul.li: The Test Report(s) is/are valid only to the sample submitted to the laboratory.
